title: Dan Neil, Aaron Robinson
description:
Once again the dynamic duo of Aaron Robinson (Car & Driver) and Dan Neil (@DanNeilWSJ) join us for a round of podcasting.  Dan is fresh off of a BMW i8 press event and gives us his take on the i8 and i3.  Aaron gives us a report on his long term Jaguar F-Type and later in the show we play a rousing game of "Guess the Horsepower".  We also touch upon a multitude of other topics as can be found below.

  • modern motor oils
  • the state of Jaguar
  • Hyundai vs. Kia
  • Chevy SS Manual
  • Pebble Beach
  • Airstream trailers
  • Toyota departing California
  • Chevy Spark Electric
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
